tool_description: This API provides complete data from Investing.com. Including Stocks, Indices, Commodities, News and many more.
name: Investing
title: Investing

api_list.name: Get List Countries
api_list.description: This endpoint provides the Country List information available for the 'Stock Info' tag
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://investing4.p.rapidapi.com/stock/list-countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "investing4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://investing4.p.rapidapi.com/stock/list-countries"

print(response.json())
